resources.string: Created By Maxim Dostra & Almog Menashe
Lie on your back on a mattress,\nLift your knees up and Lift your torso toward your knees.
▪ Exercise duration: 1 min\n▪ Duration of rest: 30 sec\n▪ Number of repetitions: 3
A column with a space in the legs, Hold the bottles / weights, Snap the arms to the body, And lift the bottles / weights upwards.
Hold the pole and lift yourself up.
Lie on your stomach and lift yourself with your hands.
Put the chair in front of you and go up and down from it.
Hold the bottles / weights and lift upwards.
▪ Number of repetitions: 10\n▪ Duration of rest: 45 sec\n▪ Number of sets: 3
Complete the hearts according to the next workout
